instructions: Scoop Breyers(R) All Natural Ice Cream into prepared crust. Drizzle with melted Skippy(R) Creamy Peanut Butter, then add sprinkles. Cover and freeze until ready to serve. Let stand 5 minutes before slicing. Garnish, if desired, with your favorite sundae toppings.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 quart) container Breyers® All Natural Ice Cream, slightly softened
1 (9 inch) chocolate crumb crust or graham cracker crust
1/2 cup Skippy® Creamy or Super Chunk® Peanut Butter, melted
title: Family Dish: Easy As Ice Cream Pie
